name: Weapon Shift
description:
Description:

Fight some bosses in this side-scrolling shmup game.

Use 25 weapon types in this game.

The real boss here was scope creep lol

Anyways, I hope you enjoy the game!

Side Note: I want to go back and clean up + fix aspects of the game so that players can experience the full version.

Controls:

Move: WASD or Arrow Keys

Jump: W or Up

Pick-Up Materials: Space Key or Down Key

Craft Weapon (When You Collect 2 Materials): E Button
